channel.title: Semiconductor Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Semiconductor Industry on FinanClub

item.title: TSM
item.description: score:30 Chances: TSM has recently received a substantial subsidy from Japan to build a second chip fabrication plant, signaling a potential for expansion and increased production capacity. Risks: There is a risk of geopolitical tensions impacting TSM’s operations, particularly in the context of growing tensions between China and Japan.

item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:109 Chances: The semiconductor industry is booming, and Applied Materials is well-positioned to benefit from this growth.The company is undervalued on a DCF basis and has a predictable business.State-of-the-art toolset will bridge academic innovations and industry pathways to scale for semiconductors, microelectronics and other critical technologies.
